title: The Most Disturbing Interview I’ve Ever Heard (Ep 1229)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning interview with this Democrat Governor on the Fox News Channel where he makes some deeply troubling comments. I also address the new report from Fox News about the biggest “coverup” in history. Finally, I address newly declassified footnotes about the Spygate scandal which will open your eyes to the malfeasance that occurred. 

News Picks:


Bombshell report indicates that the Chinese government engaged in the most expensive coverup in history.


More explosive information about the China coverup of the Wuhan Virus. 


Sheriffs in Michigan are defying the tyrannical Governor.


CNN gets caught promoting Chinese propaganda.

Jobless claims soar again.

More FBI shenanigans in the Spygate scandal. 

The Governor of New Jersey says he wasn’t thinking about the Bill of Rights when making these decisions.


Unreal! Look what the WHO was spending their money on. 

Can the President adjourn Congress.
